cause.description:
Tim here. You might already know that I'm participating in the AIDS Walk Boston this year but just in case you don't, here are a few details.
I set myself a goal of $1500 so please please keep supporting me and spread the word about my walk for AIDS.
I NEED YOUR SUPPORT!
Each dollar you donate can help the AIDS Action Committee stop the HIV/AIDS epidemic.
You'll be supporting their vital prevention, education and direct services to people living with HIV. Private dollars also fund 100% of AAC's public policy efforts, both at the State House in Boston, as well as on Capitol Hill in Washington.
Thank you for supporting me always, but especially in this challenge; you really can make a difference!
http://www.aac.org/goto/timwalksforaids
1. To stop the HIV/AIDS epidemic.
2. Prevent new infections.
3. Optimize the health of those already infected.
cause.mission: To raise over $1500 for the AIDS Action Committee here in Boston & to raise general awareness about the disease.
cause.name: Tim Walks for AIDS, Boston 2007
